response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending this exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell the product to you at an exceptional price of $750,000. This is a significant discount compared to its true worth, making it an excellent investment for someone like yourself who appreciates quality and exclusivity. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss further details. I am confident that you will find this product to be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 750000}
